### Relevant habits that might be relevant to our analysis

1. There are multiple organisms that may cause tree death around pine beetles
2. Female Pine Beetles use pheromones to attract other Pine Beetles nearby when they are ready to lay eggs
3. Pine Beetles infestations in forests are usually directional
